column4: I tried to install that Ubuntu.exe on my notebook, but when I boot it, Grub shows an error: Error 19: cannot mount selected partition. I've searched google and forums, but without success. Anybody knows how can I fix this?
if you wait a little bit longer between asking, you might get an answer.  no one seems to know and you're pretty much just annoying everyone
the person who knows the answer will not see my question if I don't repeat, because this channel is very active :/
you can repeat, just tone it down
